headline: How Investors May Respond To DoorDash (DASH) Embedding Grocery Ordering Into ChatGPT With OpenAI
summary: In December 2025, OpenAI announced a partnership with DoorDash to integrate a DoorDash app into ChatGPT, allowing users to turn recipe suggestions into grocery orders fulfilled by nearby retailers in as little as an hour across major platforms. Beyond convenience for consumers, this integration effectively turns meal planning conversations into a new commerce channel, potentially widening DoorDash’s reach for grocery and other local categories while giving smaller merchants access to...
